description_text:
Could someone provide me with an expected shipping date on my order?
Thank you,
Kaci Widner

conversations.body_text: Hi Kaci Widner,    We apologize that the Pro X Ultra is currently out of stock at our US warehouse. We have urgently arranged an air shipment to replenish inventory, with the shipment expected to arrive at the warehouse on Friday. We will ship your order immediately upon arrival. We sincerely apologize for the delay this has caused. We will refund the additional shipping charges for you.

Just checking on the status of my order. SSN4442.

Thank you

On Thu, Dec 11, 2025, 6:27â€¯AM support@simsonn.com
Hi Kaci Widner,    Your order has been shipped and is expected to arrive on the 20th.    https://www.fedex.com/fedextrack/no-results-found?trknbr=887118587699
